Detailed Description

Query Devices Page representation.

Contains all the elements forming the Query Devices page.

Here the list of PCI devices('lspci -mn' output), user put in a text area, are read and passed to the PcimapResultWidget (Query Devices Result page).

An instance exists for session life long, and each session having their own instance.

Definition at line 25 of file pcimapQuery.hpp.

void PcimapQueryWidget::readLspciList (  )  [private]

Triggered on 'Query Devices' button click.

Read the list of PCI devices from pcimapList_ and put them into lspci_list_. Finally redirect to PcimapResultWidget (Query Devices Result page).
